name: Ultimate Survival Expert
info: Master the art of wilderness survival through increasingly difficult challenges.
accept: I'm ready to become one with nature!
decline: The wilderness is too dangerous for me now.

objectives.description: Learn basic survival skills and preparation techniques
Complete endurance training in harsh conditions
Demonstrate intimate knowledge of wilderness survival
Survive 30 days in the wilderness with minimal supplies
Achieve the rank of Ultimate Survival Expert

dialogs: Nature is both beautiful and deadly. Are you prepared to learn her secrets?
In survival, preparation and knowledge are more valuable than any weapon.
You've endured where others would fall. Your resilience grows stronger.
Few understand the wilderness as intimately as you now do.
The ultimate test awaits. Thirty days with nothing but your skills.
You are now the Ultimate Survival Expert! Nature herself bows to your expertise!
